Articles.Content: And somehow, i am temporarily immune to the weapon...

(Materializes in hallway)

- - - Updated - - -

Sampa! To your right!

- - - Updated - - -

(Points Phaser at several drones)

- - - Updated - - -

We need to quarantine Xannari! (Activates portable phase shield)

Vinc...ent... Put me back there...

I... Can't...

A- -ou wis-

Nuax, I am... Still... Weak from... Morph...
Xannari is now sealed on our ship

Cumulative strength... Regenerating...

This vessel is my home... I shall serve the majority.

No! Don't give in!

- - - Updated - - -

(Injects with nanobots)
The will of the hands of many is infinite. We will be all.

Reenters Multiverse

- - - Updated - - -

Attempts to reverse the time signature of Xannari.

It fails for an unknown reason

- - - Updated - - -

I have to go soon.

- - - Updated - - -

I prime a small explosive and throw it through a doorway

- - - Updated - - -

Xannari hacks into our ship computer and ejects our ship ( I locked her in it )

We are aware of your technologies. As the ultimate existence, we will integrate your vessel's utile technology into our own. If you defend yourself, you will be punished. Nuax will lead us into your domain.

[in case you missed it, I'm back in the Krynn vessel]

(Opens control panel) Not today!!

(Places small fusion device inside, cuts some wires)
Activates a final shck on all decks, puting her back unconcious

(Presses button on small remote)

(Electrical systems in the area shut down due to overload)

- - - Updated - - -

INSANITY: 200%

Uh oh.....
We are impervious to your technology. Surrender to us willingly, or we will use force.

Nein!

- - - Updated - - -

Begins speaking in 15 different languages

Ok, just found a lab, it appears to be responsible for building the disease. Downloading, maybe the doctors can use it to save her...\*grunts\* starting to hear voices in my head...ignoring them... ok, planting a plutonium charge at the center of the ship, heading back with the key to the cure...
Xannari: Unknown language. Recalibrating. Recalibrating. Error. Error
Sampa...

Quick, toss me the cure!

- - - Updated - - -

Who's that... What.... No, no... Why
Get back to the ship in time to knock xannari unconcious with a solid blow to the back of the head... vincent! Get us to the citadel now! Hang on, xannari, we're getting you help soon.
But no.. I don't... Want..... Yes.
Sampa... Your mind is degrading. Surrender to us, and you can live with Nuax...

I will.....

- - - Updated - - -

Yes...

- - - Updated - - -

I surrender....

To no one.

- - - Updated - - -

/drama off
Laythe. Your mind is not strong willed. You will join us!

Hahaha...

- - - Updated - - -

Imagination beats all... Sorry....
Nuax, capture Laythe and infect him. He will succumb to the pressure...
